flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.summary:
This Guide contains Facts and Techniques involved in making a GPS Device For Vehicle Tracking using Wireless networks.
The emphasis is on making a compact device that can be upto the mark in comparision with the Ones's available with the Gps-vendors in c
guide.title: GPS for Vehicle Tracking using Wireless Networks
